page.title: 02ARMED FORCES STOKE ON TERN
page.content: { OLD CAMPSITES IN OUR AREA} { } Distinctive features of our area are the airfield, the old Hospital site and the Industrial Estate. They were used in World War Two. They are made up of old wartime buildings. After the war there was no further use for those buildings so they were left to stand empty and fall into disrepair. Now the Industrial Estate is used as a garage for mechanics and carpenters. Also small businesses such as Fence-making and Garden Shed construction are housed there.Old hangars which were part of R.A.F.Tern Hill are used as a Sports Centre and also as storage depots for potatoes. The old Hospital Site is used for housing pigs and straw.
